attributes.action: reduce the legal gestational age for abortion from 24 weeks to 16 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the advances in medical science over the past two decades, most babies now born after 24 weeks gestation are completely viable.  They also have a fully developed central nervous system and feel pain in just the same way as a baby born at full term.    

It is therefore uspeakably cruel for fetuses who have reached this gestational age to have their lives terminated by abortion.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reduce the legal gestational age for abortion from 24 weeks to 16 weeks."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14703.asp

Prime Minister's Office
